name: 2pi Tetris
description:
Have you ever wondered what 360° tetris would be like? Well now you don't have to! Try your luck in this minimalistic game with easy controls and amazing features such as: rotating blocks that are here to ruin everything you're trying to achieve!

Left & right for block movement, up for placing a block and down for rotating it. In two players mode, controls for the second player are: A & D for movement, S for placement and W for rotating blocks.
